flawed_nl_solution:
Michael takes half which is 60 pieces / 2 = <<60/2=30>>30 pieces.
Paige then takes half of this which gives her 30 pieces / 2 = <<30/2=15>>15 pieces.
Mandy is therefore left with 60 pieces - 30 pieces - 15 pieces = <<60-30-15=13>>13 pieces.
#### 13

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
